_sText: ___ BETA 3 notes___ -Sorted the problem of spawning without Deagle. -Bot nav file included (not optimized though). ___ BETA 2 notes___ -Added lights to the map but also increased the brightness of the general lighting in the room. -Lowered the sarcophagus so you can shoot over them. -New pillars -New stairs in the alcoves -New textures -Aligned some of the old textures -Sorted some minor issues ___ BETA 1 notes___ This is a beta version of a deagle map I have been working on in between other map projects e.g. de_astute_dmw. The map has 6 spawn points for each team. I haven't spent more than 4-5 hours on it so there is still some work to do. Some textures aren't perfectly aligned or final for that matter. Still it is playable and fun. Any feedback is appreciated. The Madonna Statue is made by Hessi. Nav file and custom stuff are included in the bsp. Thanks to the people at Dead Men Walking for testing it so far. Cheers Doc
